thread.title: the mclaren 720S velocity custom supercar by MSO
thread.title_full: the mclaren 720S velocity custom supercar by MSO

author: martin hislop I designboom
title: the mclaren 720S velocity custom supercar by MSO
text:
the mclaren 720S velocity custom supercar by MSO mar 11, 2017 the mclaren 720S velocity custom supercar by MSO 

the bespoke mclaren ‘720S’ supercar customized by the british-automaker’s special operations division, MSO, is unveiled in geneva following the debut of the second super series . its ‘velocity’ theme celebrates extreme performance with a paint theme comprising two pearlescent hues of red; ‘nerello’ red, is used on the front and upper body panels of the car – including on the red-tinted visual carbon fiber bonnet – and fades into a vivid ‘volcano’ red that covers the sides and rear of the car. the unique paintwork is complemented by lightweight alloy wheels, finished in metallic bronze. 
all images © mclaren automotive / MSO 


a range of exterior carbon fiber parts selected from the MSO collection also features on the 720s ‘velocity’, further enhancing the bold and purposeful appearance of the second super series. in addition to the red carbon fiber bonnet, a gloss carbon rear deck vent, gloss carbon fiber service cover, gloss carbon rear aero bridge, and satin carbon full length sill cover are also fitted. 


stepping inside the spacious, light and airy cabin of the ‘velocity’ supercar, occupants are presented with a carbon black alcantara trim throughout, providing a technical, sporting feel with a luxurious tactile finish, contrasting with ‘harissa’ red leather details. complementing the exterior ‘velocity’ theme, ‘harissa’ red highlights are continued throughout the interior, including on the fascia, steering wheel, doors and across the sports seats, enhancing mclaren’s most luxurious super series interior to date. 


‘the MSO mission is to fulfil customer desire for exclusivity in their choice of mclaren,’ explains ansar ali, managing director of mclaren special operations. he continues, ‘the lean, sculpted beauty of the new 720S provides the perfect starting point for owners to be creative and the specification of this MSO 720S ‘velocity’ showcases a taste of the customisation options that are possible.’ martin hislop I designboom
